promptPrefix:
Prompt: Write an article on a topic of your choice following the structure provided below. Use H1, H2, and H3 headings for optimization. You can utilize this structure to organize your thoughts and create a comprehensive and engaging article. [TARGETLANGUAGE] [PROMPT]English

Introduction:
Background:
Problem Statement:
Statistics and Data:
Expert Quotes:
Case Studies:
Benefits and Advantages:
Challenges and Limitations:
Step-by-Step Guide:
Tips and Tricks:
Pros and Cons:
Comparison:
Future Trends:
Case Studies:
Common Mistakes:
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ):
Best Practices:
Ethical Considerations:
Resource Recommendations:
Personal Experiences:
Research Methodology:
Industry Insights:
User Testimonials:
Counterarguments:
Conclusion:
title: 1️⃣Best article structure & optimization
